name: This Is For You!
description:
“This Is For You!”, is a game about picking as many flowers as you can hold, so that you can make your mom happy!

Controls:

  • 'Z' - Pick Flowers
  • 'X' - Open/Close inventory

Features:

  • Procedurally generated flowers
  • Clean Source Code
  • Cuteness Overload
  • An ending that’s good for the heart ;)

If you take any screenshots, we would love to see them! You can post them in the comments below, or tweet at us using the hashtag #thisisforyou

Made by: itsDrell and tinkkles (twitter names)
